name: Skate or Die on Tsunami Road
name_original: Skate or Die on Tsunami Road
description:
Made by 1e0 and cocosar07 for the LÖVE Jam 2022.

You play a skater trying to avoid a tsunami caused by an earthquake!

Lets us know in comments how far you went !

Controls
  • A/D : go left or right
  • Left/Right : Rotate while in the air
  • Space/w : Jump
